title: Didn't receive chest for S rank game?
body:
I just played a rank game today and two of my fellow team member received an S- or higher for playing their characters. However I was playing Janna and have not receive a chest with her at all before or after this game. Is there a reason as to why I didn't get one? I have checked and I am up for receiving a chest this week. Please let me know if you can help me. 

https://imgur.com/a/c6wsA

replies.body: The team member has to be a part of your premade before the match starts.  Unfortunately, a chest will not currently drop if that teammate was random.  Sorry for the confusion!
